016package com.nickbenn.adventofcode.day15;
017
018import static com.nickbenn.adventofcode.view.Presentation.NUMERIC_SOLUTION_FORMAT;
019
020import com.nickbenn.adventofcode.view.DataSource;
021import java.io.IOException;
022import java.util.HashMap;
023import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
024import java.util.Map;
025import java.util.regex.Matcher;
026import java.util.regex.Pattern;
027import java.util.stream.Stream;
028
029public class LensLibrary {
030
031  private static final int MULTIPLIER = 17;
032  private static final int MASK = 255;
033  private static final Pattern SPLITTER = Pattern.compile(",");
034  private static final Pattern EXTRACTOR = Pattern.compile("^\\s*([^-=]+)(?:(-)|(=))(\\d*)\\s*$");
035
036  private final DataSource source;
037
038  public LensLibrary() throws IOException{
039    this(DataSource.DEFAULT_INPUT_FILE);
040  }
041
042  public LensLibrary(String inputFile) throws IOException {
043    source = new DataSource.Builder(this)
044        .setInputFile(inputFile)
045        .build();
046  }
047
048  public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
049    System.out.printf(NUMERIC_SOLUTION_FORMAT, 1, new LensLibrary().getHashSum());
050    System.out.printf(NUMERIC_SOLUTION_FORMAT, 2, new LensLibrary().getFocusingPower());
051  }
052
053  public int getHashSum() throws IOException {
054    try (Stream<String> lines = source.blocks(SPLITTER)) {
055      return lines
056          .mapToInt(this::hash)
057          .sum();
058    }
059  }
060
061  public int getFocusingPower() throws IOException {
062    return buildBoxes()
063        .entrySet()
064        .stream()
065        .mapToInt((boxEntry) -> {
066          int boxNumber = boxEntry.getKey();
067          int[] position = {0};
068          return (boxNumber + 1) * boxEntry
069              .getValue()
070              .values()
071              .stream()
072              .mapToInt((focalLength) -> ++position[0] * focalLength)
073              .sum();
074        })
075        .sum();
076  }
077
078  private Map<Integer, Map<String, Integer>> buildBoxes() throws IOException {
079    Map<Integer, Map<String, Integer>> boxes = new HashMap<>();
080    try (Stream<String> lines = source.blocks(SPLITTER)) {
081      lines
082          .map(EXTRACTOR::matcher)
083          .filter(Matcher::matches)
084          .forEachOrdered((matcher) -> {
085            String label = matcher.group(1);
086            Map<String, Integer> contents =
087                boxes.computeIfAbsent(hash(label), (box) -> new LinkedHashMap<>());
088            if (matcher.group(2) != null) {
089              contents.remove(label);
090            } else {
091              contents.put(label, Integer.parseInt(matcher.group(4)));
092            }
093          });
094    }
095    return boxes;
096  }
097
098  private int hash(String input) {
099    return input
100        .chars()
101        .reduce(0, (sum, next) -> (sum + next) * MULTIPLIER & MASK);
102  }
103
104}
